column5: http://www.towarf.com/g20.html  harbour restrictions for the G8- G20  Cheers Peter
Why are you pointing people to your website instead of the official one?  http://www.tc.gc.ca/eng/ontario/g20marine.htm
Because that is where i got the info from but if it bothers you that much feel free to adjust the link.  cheers peter

As if Toronto hasn't been screwed enough..  one f-ing billion dollars for 12 hours of meetings.. tens of millions lost revenue (restaurants, etc..)  We get nothing from the Feds.. one billion could have built 10km of subway lines..    This event should never be held in a big city.. put it on a cruie ship in the middle of the Pacific.. commie protesters can't swim
